table_description: Play by play level dataset for WNBA data ranging from 2018-2024 (partial) season, with information to the level of specific plays, including location data for shot attempts, time of play, event outcome, assist information (including key players involved), time-outs, and events like coach's challenges.

values.column_description: Unique identifier for the play.
Sequence number of the play within the game.
Numeric identifier for the type of play.
Text description of the type of play (e.g. 'Jumpball', 'Step Back Jump Shot').
Detailed description of the play.
Score of the away team after the play.
Score of the home team after the play.
Period number of the game (e.g. 1 for 1st Quarter).
Display value for the period (e.g. '1st Quarter').
Shows the clock display value at the time of the event.
Flag to determine whether the event was a scoring play.
Integer to determine what's the score value for individual plays.
Identifier for the team involved in the play.
Athlete ID for main person in event.
Athlete ID for secondary person in event.
Athlete ID for third person in event.
Shows the wall clock display value at the time of the event.
Flag to determine whether the event was a shooting play.
Displays the x coordinate for the event to map events such as shot location.
Displays the y coordinate for the event to map events such as shot location.
Value for each individual season (2018-2024).
Type of the season (e.g. regular season, playoffs).
Numeric identifier for the away team.
Full name of the away team.
Away team mascot.
Away team abbreviation.
Away team alternate name.
Numeric identifier for the home team.
Full name of the home team.
Home team mascot.
Home team abbreviation.
Home team alternate name.
DO NOT USE - Home Team Spread.
DO NOT USE - Game Spread.
DO NOT USE - Home Favorite.
DO NOT USE - Game Spread Available.
Unique identifier for the game - use to join to schedule table and to box tables.
Quarter identifier.
Time identifier for event (in mm:ss).
Game clock in minutes.
Game clock in seconds.
Indicator if a timeout was called by the home team.
Indicator if a timeout was called by the away team.
Half identifier (1 or 2).
Half identifier (1 or 2).
Numeric identifier indicating the leading team in the quarter of the game.
Numeric identifier indicating the leading team in the half of the game.
Number of seconds in the quarter remaining.
Number of seconds in the half remaining.
Number of seconds in the game remaining.
Number of plays in the game.
Number of seconds in the quarter remaining.
Number of seconds in the half remaining.
Number of seconds in the game remaining.
Indicates what period in the game this is.
Numeric identifier indicating the lagging team in the quarter of the game.
Numeric identifier indicating the lagging team in the half of the game.
X-coordinate of the play on the court (cleaned).
Y-coordinate of the play on the court (cleaned).
Date of the game.
Date and time when the game was played.
Abbreviation for the type of play.
